ygData.subject: Re: !!beggining human wizard!!
ygData.msgSnippet: I always found fishing to be good way to make some cash.  Not terribly exciting, but maybe more respectable than begging. ... From: Ken Lee  To:
ygData.messageBody:
I always found fishing to be good way to make some cash. Not terribly
exciting, but maybe more respectable than begging.
-----Original Message-----
From: Ken Lee <kenlee@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 29, 1999 5:32 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: !!beggining human wizard!!


>From: "Ken Lee" <kenlee@...>
>
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: XxDEANERxX@... <XxDEANERxX@...>
>To: EQ_Wizards@onelist.com <EQ_Wizards@onelist.com>
>Date: 29 avril, 1999 16:56
>Subject: [eq_wizards] !!beggining human wizard!!
>
>
>>From: XxDEANERxX@...
>>
>>what spells do u recommend i get first to start??
>
> You're human? Try sphere of light. You'll need it
>
>> where do i get them from??
>
> Your guild. Look around the city you start in.
>
>>what do i need to do to get some money??
>
> Kill things and sell their treasure.
>
>>and finally whast a safe, quick way to get some money??
>
> Whine and beg the nearest -PvP barbarian decked out in full chain until
>they give you a couple of plat to shut up.
>
>J/K.... There's no safe and easy way to get money till you're a bit higher
>in level. Then you can root and shoot.
>
>
>Zalbar
>15th Wizard
>Solusek Ro
>
>P.S. Try just playing the game a bit. You'll have more fun. You don't lose
>any xps till 6th level so, die if you have to. No hassles.
>
>
